name: wundm
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cuni(cuni(c0)), c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cuni(cuni(c0)), c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(cuni(c0)), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))

|- wi(w0, wcel(cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wss(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0)))

body.origin:
|- wss(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0)))
-| wss(cdm(c0), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
-| wss(cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ dom(c0)⊆ ⋃ ⋃ c0
⊣ dom(c0)⊆(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0))
⊣ (dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0))⊆ ⋃ ⋃ c0

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wss(cdm(c0), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
-| wss(cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → dom(c0)∈ c1)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ WUni)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
⊣ dom(c0)⊆(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0))
⊣ (dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0))⊆ ⋃ ⋃ c0

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wss(cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0)))

|- wi(w0, wcel(cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))

comment: A weak universe is closed under the domain operator. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
